<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Miraculous Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3153) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 57</row>

**Archetype** [Vehicle Mechanic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=113)

**Prerequisites**
[Vehicle Mechanic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3147)

</column>

---

With superior engineering and magical application, you have freed your signature [vehicle](/equipment/vehicles) from the bonds of gravity, allowing it to soar through the sky like a dragon. The vehicle gains magical propulsion and a fly Speed equal to its fastest current Speed. If your signature vehicle already had a fly Speed, reduce the distance the vehicle needs to make a 90-degree turn to half the usual length (typically half the length of the vehicle).
name: Miraculous Flight
